word: The mock trial of Christ shows how base the priesthood had become. The priests hired people to testify under oath to falsehood, that Jesus might be condemned. But on this occasion, truth came to the help of Christ. . . . Thus it was shown that the testimonies borne against Him were false, that the witnesses had been hired by men who cherished in their hearts the basest elements of corruption. It was God\92s design that the men who delivered Jesus should hear the testimony of His innocence. \93I find no fault in him,\94 Pilate declared. And Judas, throwing at the feet of the priests the money he had received for betraying Christ, bore testimony, \93I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood.\94
